De gloria Atheniensium Machine readable text Plutarch Gregorius N. Bernardakis&responsibility;&fund.NEH; &Perseus.publish;
Plutarch Moralia Gregorius N. Bernardakis
Leipzig Teubner 1889
2

div1.p:
lac. addidit Duebnerus, Xylandro monente tau=t' o)rqw=s me

 ga a)ne/lh|s tou\s pra/ttontas, ou)x e(/ceis tou\s gra/fontas;. a)/nele th

u(pokritai/, ta\s tw=n strathgw=n kai\ basile/wn pra/ceis diatiqe/menoi kai\ tai=s e)kei/nwn u(poduo/menoi mnh/mais i(/n' w(s au)gh=s tinos kai\ fwto\s meta/sxwsin. a)nakla=tai ga a)po\ tw=n pratto/ntwn e)pi\ tou\s gra/fontas kai\ a)nala/mpei do/chs ei)/dwlon a)llotri/as, e)mfainome/nhs dia\ tw=n lo/gwn th=s pra/cews w(s e)n e)so/ptrw|,
